definitions.definition: Material (such as clothing, makeup, a wig) used to alter one’s visual appearance in order to hide one's identity or assume another.
definitions.example: A cape and moustache completed his disguise.

definitions.definition: The appearance of something on the outside which masks what's beneath.
The act of disguising, notably as a ploy.
definitions.example: Any disguise may expose soldiers to be deemed enemy spies.

definitions.definition: A change of behaviour resulting from intoxication.
To change the appearance of (a person or thing) so as to hide, or to assume an identity.
To avoid giving away or revealing (something secret); to hide by a false appearance.
To affect or change by liquor; to intoxicate.
